summary: This mod enables HDT breast/butt physics for UNP while wearing the Forsworn armor
descriptionHtml:
[u][size=5]Update 2018-07-11[/size][/u]

I have created an SSE port of this mod, using the CBP Physics system:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18532]https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/18532[/url]

I was looking at various topless/no-underwear versions of the female Forsworn armor, and found that even with HDT physics installed, the breast/butt bounce effect stopped when the armor was equipped.  That's usually desired for armor/clothing to prevent clipping, but the Forsworn armor is a special case, so as my first ever modding project, I fixed it.

This is my first mod, and very much a work-in-progress as I'm learning the ropes.  For this reason only a single weight version of the armor is currently available.

[u][size=4]Update 2018-06-12[/size][/u]

An attempt to source a suitable texture turned into a wholesale edit to the mesh - this mod is now compatible with any forsworn armor texture.  I recommend the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73515]Rustic Forsworn[/url] texture from Gamwich, but any should be suitable.

The requirement for the UNP HDT-PE body is now gone, as the mod is now using [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015]Bodyslide[/url].  Currently there is only a zero-weight version of this armor - I'm still learning the ropes in Bodyslide.

There are now three variants available: Topless, Topless+No Necklace, and Necklace-only.  All with HDT on the body mesh.

Huge thank you to Exeter for the fantastic  [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305]UNP Female Armors[/url] mod, on which this one is based.  That mod is listed as a requirement for this one - you don't NEED it, but this mod includes only the armor mesh so you'll have to source the boots and headdress somewhere else, or use the defaults.

[size=4][u]Previous Versions:[/u][/size]

[s]This mod is a variant of the Forsworn Armor mesh from the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305]UNP Female Armors[/url] mod by Exeter, and requires the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21199]UNP HDT-PE BBP TBBP[/url] body mesh from Turbosundance.  I don't know how it will behave with other body meshes.

This is a mesh ONLY.  You will need to use a texture mod such as [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/266]Forsworn Armor - Topless V2[/url] by abb1 to add the actual texture. Personally, I'm using an edited version of the [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73515]Rustic Forsworn[/url] texture from Gamwich, and it looks great.

This is my first mod, and it is likely to be not-well-optimized.  I have no idea how much of the UNP HDT/HDT Physics/XP32/ mods are actually required, so best to use all of them.  This is just the armor, so you'll need to use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7305]UNP Female Armors[/url] for the boots/headdress.[/s]
author: StillNotListening
